Description:
This web service will retrieve condition (diagnosis) data from a patient's chart. This includes any data found in the patient's problem list across all encounters. This resource can be queried by a combination of patient ID and status.

Note that this resource retrieves only data stored in problem list (LPL) records. As a result, medical history data documented outside of a patient's problem list isn't available to applications using this service unless that data is retrieved using another method.

This resource can also return unconfirmed Condition resources in the "holding tank" that drives the EpicCare Reconcile Outside Data Activity. Note - once a clinician reconciles an problem, a new Condition resource associated with the reconciled problem will be available in the normal Condition.Search results, and the unconfirmed problem in the "holding tank" will no longer appear in the Condition.Search results.

category.Name: category
category.Description: This is "problem-list-item", "encounter-diagnosis", or "health-concern". The default is to return problem list conditions.

clinical-status.Name: clinical-status
clinical-status.Description:
Status of the condition

FHIR Status Epic Status
active active conditions
resolved resolved conditions
inactive deleted conditions

If no status is specified all active (confirmed) conditions will be returned.

*Note: Any FHIR Status not listed in the above table is not returned.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: A reference to an Encounter resource that the diagnosis is asserted. If not provided, only problem list conditions will be returned.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be specified. If both are specified, they must reference the same patient.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be specified. If both are specified, they must reference the same patient.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
For encounter-level diagnoses, this is "encounter-diagnosis". For problems, this is "problem-list-item". For health concerns, this is "health-concern".

Starting in the May 2021 version of Epic, can also include additional category codes based on diagnosis groupers defined by the Epic organization.

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description: The status of the problem. Can be active, inactive, or resolved.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The external codes associated with the problem. If a list of codes is sent, they're listed in this element. Otherwise, this element uses the problem name from the name element.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Problem

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to the Patient associated with the Condition.

verificationStatus.Name: verificationStatus
verificationStatus.Description: If this is on the patient's local chart, the value is "confirmed". If it is outside data, it is "unconfirmed". If it is deleted, it is "entered-in-error".

total.Name: total
total.Description: Total resources that match the search criteria.
